body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Matthew Rodriguez and the customer's name is Joyce Walker.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Corporation. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I'm having some issues with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. For verification purposes, could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is john.doe@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have all the information I need to look into your issue. Please hold on for a moment while I check your order details.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Everything seems to be in order on our end. I will escalate this issue to our support team, and they will get back to you within one business day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your patience and for choosing Acme Corporation. Have a great day! Goodbye.
